remarks: Uniqueness condition for binary relationship over the ` 2nd ` relationship.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2015.)
statement:
br2ndeq.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
br2ndeq.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
br2ndeq.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
br2ndeq $p |- ( <. A , B >. 2nd C <-> C = B ) $.
